column5: Just a heads up - I accidentally clicked on one of the ads near the top of the page and:       Could be nothing but I think it should be looked into...
it happens a hacker most likely took over the site or redirected the link to porn site most times a day or 2 and they are back to normal
It is sad that even the mighty Google can gets hacked. They have been notified and are correcting it as we speak. Thanks for the heads up.  Art
